notesStmt.note: Missing portion at the beginning and at the end; lacunae after folios: 18, 26, 35, 41, 59, 67, 107, 116. Most of the extant leaves are more or less mutilated. Fading ink.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: The commentary of Japheth ben Ali ha-Levi on the Minor Prophets.

msItem.title: Perush nevi᾿im aḥaronim פרוש נביאים אחרונים

collation.p: Originally 24 quires of mostly 10 leaves each. At present, only quires nos. 7 and 14-17 are complete, nos. 1-6 and 19-23 are lost entirely.

binding.p: BM/BL in-house. Spine: 'Minor Prophets. Yefet's Comm. Heb. & Arab. Brit. Mus. Oriental 2550.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: Moses Wilhelm Shapira (b. 1830, d. 1884), an antiquities dealer of Jerusalem: purchased by the British Library from him on 23 July 1881, folio [121v].
